dmca.title: silverpassboard.com
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

 

Please visit our web site at
www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme
nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

 

 

________________________________

From: Alecy.com [mailto:contact@alecy.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, February 28, 2007 5:24 AM
To: abuse; Legal; Copyright
Subject: silverpassboard.com

 

Dear Sir/Madam, 

 

I'm writing to inform you and express my concerns about one of your
clients (SILVERPASSBOARD.COM). This Website is illegally publishing
stolen passwords, aimed at unauthorized access to my paysites, and
unauthorized access of thousands of paysites around the world. This
violation is a serious crime and I'm hoping you will provide assistance
regarding this issue. I have tryed contacting SH3LLS.NET (their hosting
company) a couple times, but did not receive a reply, it looks like they
are running the website theirselves. 

 

The illegal website requires a free registration, once you have
registered an account you may login and go to the following url,
http://www.silverpassboard.com/forum/forumdisplay.php?f=12) to enter the
illegal section.
After that click on one of the topics to see the illegal breached
passwords. 

 

To make it easy for you i will provide you a username/password so you do
not have to register. 
Please follow the following steps to access the illegal passwords, 

 

Login at the following url, 
http://www.silverpassboard.com/forum/forumdisplay.php?f=12
Username: aftereight
password: test 

 

Then go to the following sample of a topic containing the illegal
passwords: 
http://www.silverpassboard.com/forum/showthread.php?t=12363

 

But that isn't all. They also have a private copyrighted picture section
where they provide links to copyrighted content. 

 

http://www.silverpassboard.com/forum/forumdisplay.php?f=35

 

Quick action to eliminate this lawbreaker would be beneficial for
everyone, including you. As a hosting provider who eliminates
untrustworthy clients from your database, you'll enjoy good publicity,
gain a reputation as a provider who cares about copyright laws, and save
yourself from dealing with any lawyers. 

 

Thank you in advance for your cooperation. I look forward to hearing
from you about this serious issue. 

 

Kind regards, 

 

David Aminari
contact@alecy.com
